description:
Application for a non-material amendment following planning permission ref: P2018/1764/FUL dated 19/09/2018 which granted permission for the following:
 
Change of Use from Retail (A1) to a Mixed Use Consisting of Retained Retail Unit (A1), Community Cafe (A3), and Night Shelter (Sui Generis), Including Associated New Openings to the front and rear of the site.

The current Non Material Minor Amendment seeks permission for the following alterations to the approved scheme: 

Front elevation
proposed high level louvre
existing opening adapted to allow for new fire escape door to the dorm
Proposed high level exhaust louvre

Rear elevation

new window opening in existing opening
new window and entrance door to the shelter
new window in new opening 

Undercroft

Proposed new window in existing opening 
Proposed window to dorm in existing opening 
Proposed fire escape door to dorm in existing opening 
Proposed fire escape door to dorm in new opening
decision_conditions: Your attention is drawn to the fact that all new windows and doors approved within this NMA will need to fully comply with Secure by Design Accreditation. Any future review of the operational management plan should reflect these alterations and these new fire escape doors are only to be used in case of emergency and not for general access and egress to the site as it operates.
